content.question: Students attach a light string to a cart. The string passes over an ideal pulley to a hanger. A number of small identical plates are on both the cart and the hanger. The students measure the acceleration of the cart when the cart-hanger-plate system is released from rest. The students repeat this procedure for several trials. For each trial, students move one plate from the cart onto the hanger. The data are collected and shown in the straight-line graph. Which quantities on the vertical and horizontal axis, respectively, could produce the graph shown?
